name: unburnt
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not burnt: There were no unburnt trees for at least several hundred metres. Unburnt fuel creates pollution in the form of air-borne hydrocarbons.
More examplesFewer examplesThe smoke would have contained a mixture of unburnt, partially burnt, and completely burnt oil. Amazingly, the foliage was left unburnt as the fire raced past.Long-unburnt forests develop very heavy fuel accumulations which pose a threat and need to be cleared.As well as toxic carbon monoxide, vehicles also release unburnt hydrocarbons into the air.
